title: Disable Move Camera on Recall
body: I was how to disable the camera snap to the fountain after finishing a recall. I know there is a way to disable the camera snap on respawn, but that is something different. I am confident there is a way, because I used to have it disabled, but then I reset to the default settings, and I the map now pans to the spawn whenever I finish a recall. Is there some file I could change that would disable this feature?

replies.body: I looked into this, but it looks like that feature doesn't appear to be currently available.  You may see suggestions on how to modify it, but it doesn't currently work.  I recommend posting any feedback on that over at the [gameplay](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards for consideration.  Sorry!
